titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the States should adopt uniform voting procedures to carry out the election of the President and Vice President.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 12/15/2000--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that the States should adopt uniform procedures to carry out the election of the President and the Vice President, including those for voter registration, absentee voting, early voting, and voting hours on election day.
